internships.description: Worked with the Advanced Agentic Coding team on developing AI agents for code assistance. Improved agent reasoning capabilities and integrated with multiple IDE tools.
highlights: Implemented a new RAG pipeline for documentation retrieval
Optimized agent latency by 20% through efficient context management
Collaborated with senior engineers on system design and architecture

internships.description: Explored large-scale data processing for telemetry analysis. Built predictive models for system health monitoring and anomaly detection.
highlights: Developed a real-time dashboard for monitoring telemetry data
Achieved 95% accuracy in predicting system failures 30 minutes in advance
Automated data cleaning pipelines using SQL and Python

internships.description: Contributed to the development of a collaborative product studio platform. Focused on real-time features and responsive UI design.
highlights: Built a real-time chat and document editing feature
Refactored frontend components for better performance and reusability
Assisted in migrating the backend to a microservices architecture
